Text: The file refuses to open for some reason
Yeah, it seems something is wrong with this torrent. I can open the file but when it starts to download I get a big red X and it won't download. :(
everything is working fine for me. thank you for the copy.
No, they're correct... the files are improperly named.  The file extension is missing from the file name and results in an "invalid" file name/path message.
